settings.title: Shout Settings
settings.set_own_password: Let users make their own password - SSO Compatibility

setup.title: Setup Private Messaging
setup.header_setup: Enter your account login password to setup private messaging.
setup.header_import: Enter your account login password to import your private messages.
setup.header_set_own: Enter a password to setup private messages.
setup.success: Private messaging is now ready, your page will now reload...

modal.title: Start Conversation
modal.help: Start typing a username to start a chat.
modal.help_start: Type your first message. This will be the only message you can send until {username} responds. Click the user to select a different recipient.
modal.copied: Your message has been copied to the clipboard.
modal.more_users: If you don't see the user you are looking for, they don't have private messaging setup.
modal.already: You already have a conversation with {username}.

forum.user_modal_alert: {username} has private messaging setup, their password cannot be safely changed.

chat.recovery_message: System message: Encryption sync lost and recovered
chat.failed_message: Failed to decrypt message, attempting recovery method #{method}
chat.cant_send: You can't send a message until {username} responds (first message only)
chat.cant_send_toomany: Please wait for {username}'s reply before sending more messages
